title: Queens Court Apartment for Sale
details:
Apartment for Sale in Queens Court

This particular apartment is a beautiful apartment with 3 Bedrooms, 1 attached bathroom to the Master Bedroom and 1 Common bath. It also consists with separate maid's area and a washroom and a Spacious apartment that has a floor area of nearly 1700 sq.ft.

Other Facilities:
The premises include facilities such as a designated Car Park with 24/7 security.

Location: Located in Galle Road, Colombo 03 with walking distance to Galle Face Hotel and surrounding Government & International Schools, Supermarkets, Restaurants, Shopping Malls, and many other amenities.

For an immediate viewing, Please contact TSL Property on: +94778973140 (Viber / Whatsapp also available) for more details and to arrange an immediate viewing.
